node.detail_zh: 患者為明愛醫院內科醫生，無外遊紀錄，7 月 31 日出現症狀，8 月 1 日開始喉嚨痛而到急症室求診，其母親於 7 月 31 日晚確診。患者最近上班日期為 7 月 31 日，其工作的內科病房有另外 3 名病人先後確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is a physician at Caritas Medical Centre, has no recent travel history, and developed symptoms on July 31. On Aug 1, he went to the Accident & Emergency Department due to sore throat, as his mother was tested positive on July 31. His last day of work was July 31, and three other patients were diagnosed positive in the internal medicine ward where he worked.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Wing Shue House, Lei Muk Shue Estate
